General.Name: Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sales of various automotive sensors and engineering plastic parts. Its products and services include sensors and accessories, fuel system accessories, automotive interior parts, etc. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co., Ltd. in October 2010. Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Yangzhou, China.
